def player_special(entity, player, args): target = args[0]
if not entity.world.from_name(target): player.print_out("{}: No such entity to target!".format(entity), place=entity.place) return False
target = entity.world.from_name(target)
player.print_out("{}: Performing the Anaconda's constriction.".format(entity), place=entity.place) entity['target'] = target.id entity.call('constrict') return True

import random
def constrict(entity): t = entity.world.from_id(entity['target'])
if not t or t['dead']: return
if random.random() <= 0.6: entity.world.broadcast(2, entity, " leaps to constrict ", t, ", but misses!", place=entity.place) return # Missed constriction! (60% chance)
if not entity['constricting']: # fall damage t['instigator'] = entity.id t.call('take_damage', 5)
if not t['dead']: entity.world.broadcast(2, entity, " leaps and constricts ", t, "!", place=entity.place)
entity['constricting'] = True
t['speedModifier'] /= 25 entity['_oldSpeedMod'] = entity['speedModifier'] entity['_fullDmg'] = 0 entity['speedModifier'] = 0
entity['_constrictHealth'] = t['health']
elif t.place != entity.place or t['dead']: entity['constricting'] = False entity['speedModifier'] = entity['_oldSpeedMod']
if t.place == entity.place and random.random() <= entity['vore']: entity.world.broadcast(2, entity, " devours what remained of ", t, "!", place=entity.place) entity['feeding'] += t['weight'] / 15
elif random.random() <= 0.8: dmg = random.uniform(15, 40) * entity['weight'] / t['weight']
entity['_fullDmg'] += dmg entity.world.broadcast(2, entity, " smashes ", t, (' further' if entity['_fullDmg'] == dmg else ''), ", provoking ", 100 * dmg / entity['_constrictHealth'], "% vital damage, for a total of ", 100 * entity['_fullDmg'] / entity['_constrictHealth'], "%!", place=entity.place)
t['instigator'] = entity.id t.call('take_damage', dmg)
